views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 to 13

Ermete Brings the Opportunity to Custom Choose Slow or Fast Speed Effects Animations when opening, closing the Applications and the Switcher!

You can Switch from an Effect to a Different one without the Needing of Respringing!

Respring required for the Switcher Effects.

With the Slow options Enabled You can use the inside Application while opening it!

More to Come in the Next Updates!

Configure options from Settings.

See Video and Screenshot below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.1
- Updated to be Compatible till iOS 13.
- Added support for arm64e/A12 Devices.
